description_html:
Inspired by mid-century modern design, BRIGGS is a stylish LED fixture that is both stunning and practical. Its geometric lines and angular design pays homage to the Cubist Brutalism movement, yet its soft bronze finish brings warmth and lightness to the space it occupies.
Geometric. Effortless. Stylish. 
Plated metal finish in champagne
Frosted white opal glass diffuser
Four unique geometric sizes available
Available in two standard clusters with four or seven pendants
Custom clusters available
Dimming options available
Custom finishes available
LED option available
Hairline Bronze finish available for custom orders only.
